main event: On the night of October 9, 1968, multiple witnesses in South Lebanon, Ohio reported seeing three large round bright orange lights over a wooded area.
interesting points: The lights were observed for approximately 20 minutes,The witnesses thought that the lights were not conventional aircraft,Two similar objects were seen in the sky at the same time, Mrs. __________ (age 36) and Mr. __________ were among the witnesses,The sighting occurred around 9:30 p.m. E.S.T. with good visibility and a clear sky.
sighted object: three large round bright orange lights
witness description: Two adults and three children observed the lights.
